amendment.description: To modify the authority to convey land at Equipment and Storage Yard, Charleston, South Carolina.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3349 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3349 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S6785-6789) To modify the authority to convey land at Equipment and Storage Yard, Charleston, South Carolina.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3349 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3349 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Hollings.
